glsa.title: Mailutils: SQL Injection
glsa.synopsis: GNU Mailutils is vulnerable to SQL command injection attacks.

background.p: GNU Mailutils is a collection of mail-related utilities.

description.p: When GNU Mailutils is built with the "mysql" or "postgres" USE flag, the sql_escape_string function of the authentication module fails to properly escape the "\" character, rendering it vulnerable to a SQL command injection.

impact.p: A malicious remote user could exploit this vulnerability to inject SQL commands to the underlying database.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNU Mailutils users should upgrade to the latest available version:
